author: Gaurang Chauhan
title: This behind the scene video featuring Iron Man, Spider-Man and Star-Lord, promises Avengers: Infinity War to be an EPIC fun - Bollywoodlife.com
text: Spider-Man This behind the scene videoâ€¦ This behind the scene video featuring Iron Man, Spider-Man and Star-Lord, promises Avengers: Infinity War to be an EPIC fun The film will bring back Robert Downey Jr, Chris Evans, Tom Holland, Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Jeremy Renner, Scarlett Johansson, Elizabeth Olsen and Paul Bettany, who will be joined by Guardians of the Galaxy stars Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Karen Gillan and Dave Bautista. Game of Thrones star Peter Dinklage will star in the film too, with Benedict Cumberbatch reprising his role as Doctor Strange. By Gaurang Chauhan | Updated: February 11, 2017 6:43 pm
